summary: "The Starry Night" is a famous painting by Vincent van Gogh, created in 1889. It shows the view from his room in a French asylum, with a made-up village below. The painting is known for its bright, swirling stars and moon. It's considered Van Gogh's best work and is now in the Museum of Modern Art in New York City. Many people recognize it as one of the greatest Western paintings.
title: The Starry Night
